# 🚀 GitHub Actions - CI/CD Pipeline

**✅ OPERATIONAL** - This directory contains **GitHub Actions workflows** for automated building, testing, and deployment of the TasklistApp. The CI/CD pipeline supports both Docker and VM deployment strategies.
